en.title: Skill Set
en.description: Exploring the diverse range of skills I've acquired and developed:

en.title: Responsive Layouts
en.description: Expertise in designing adaptable web interfaces that function seamlessly across various devices and screen sizes. Ensures optimal user experience on desktops, tablets, and mobile.

en.title: Design Principles
en.description: Mastery in creating Awesome designs, blending color theory, typography, layout, and balance for effective messaging. Proficient in enhancing user Experience

en.title: Restful API Integration
en.description: Proficiency in integrating RESTful APIs into web applications, facilitating efficient communication and data exchange between server and client.

en.title: Experienced with TypeScript
en.description: Extensive experience in using TypeScript to build robust and maintainable codebases. Enhances development with strong typing and improved code quality.

en.title: Server Side Rendering
en.description: Proficient in implementing Server Side Rendering (SSR) to improve performance and SEO. Enhances user experience by delivering faster and more dynamic web pages.

en.title: Version Control
en.description: Skilled in using version control systems like Git for efficient code management and collaboration. Ensures seamless tracking of changes and project integrity.
